title: I'm unable to change runes

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: i can't do anything to change my runes , I've clicked everywhere and nothing works it doesn't let me do anything . please may i have help on this.

replies.body:
That's super weird! I've never seen this before. I believe this could be caused by missing or corrupted files in the client, so I recommend [completing a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) of your League's files to see if it resolves this.

Let me know if that repair fixed this.
